mapper.select: SELECT i.item_id,i.is_support,i.item_name,i.item_intro,i.order_num,i.alias_name,i.title_desc,i.item_pic,i.catalogue_id, c.catalogue_id "resourceCatalogue.catalogueId",c.catalogue_name "resourceCatalogue.catalogueName" FROM t_resource_item i LEFT JOIN t_resource_catalogue c ON i.catalogue_id = c.catalogue_id

SELECT i.item_id,i.item_name,i.is_support,i.item_intro,i.order_num,i.alias_name,i.title_desc,i.item_pic,i.catalogue_id, c.catalogue_id "resourceCatalogue.catalogueId",c.catalogue_name "resourceCatalogue.catalogueName" FROM t_resource_item i LEFT JOIN t_resource_catalogue c ON i.catalogue_id = c.catalogue_id WHERE c.catalogue_name LIKE '%${catalogueName}%'

SELECT i.item_id,i.item_name,i.is_support,i.item_intro,i.order_num,i.alias_name,i.title_desc,i.item_pic,i.catalogue_id, c.catalogue_id "resourceCatalogue.catalogueId",c.catalogue_name "resourceCatalogue.catalogueName" FROM t_resource_item i LEFT JOIN t_resource_catalogue c ON i.catalogue_id = c.catalogue_id WHERE i.item_name LIKE '%${itemName}%'
